1169630.name: Traps Ahead!
1169630.description:
A 2D platformer game.
Try to avoid tricky obstacles and get the chest!

You never know what gonna happen in the next second in your life.
Everyone has been frustrated when they made mistakes.
However, once you learn something from failure, you are not gonna be afraid anymore. So as Traps Ahead!, you don't know where traps are. Just be prepared and challenge yourself!

Feature


  • 14 levels
  • 3 styles of map
  • 3 different skills

Assets:


  • Emotional Piano Loops by THEO PRIOR MUSIC
  • Free Platform Game Assets by BAYAT GAMES
  • Painted HQ 2D Forest Medieval Background by SUPER BRUTAL ASSETS
